Title: How to introduce the candidates
Designer: Office of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
Publisher: Zhongguo minzhu fazhi chubanshe (中国民主法制出版社)
Notes: Part of the series Elections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011).By using lists of candidates, with photographs, and by organizing 候选人与选民见面会 (houxuan ren yu xuanmin jianmian hui), get-to-know-your-candidate meetings.
Theme: Political ReformLegal KnowledgeElections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011)
